lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "The deal reflects a fundamental trend where airlines will increasingly become operators of assets rather than owners" to reduce their exposure to risk, he added.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: AMR is using the manufacturers' balance sheets to finance these airplanes and consequently, its debt to equity ratio will remain stable into the early 1990s," he said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The deal AMR Corp cut to buy 40 new planes is a plus for the company because it clearly puts the financial burden on aircraft manufacturers Boeing Co <BA> and <Airbus Industrie>, a European consortium, analysts said.

lst.name: sentence

lst.str: AMR is using the manufacturers' balance sheets to finance these airplanes and consequently, its debt to equity ratio will remain stable into the early 1990s," he said.
